column2: Poor - Major issues throughout; difficult to listen to; significant problems across multiple dimensions
column3: Below Average - Noticeable issues; some musical intent present but execution lacking
column4: Average - Competent playing; some mistakes or rough spots but generally acceptable
column5: Good - Solid performance; minor issues; sounds like a trained player
column6: Excellent - Professional quality; polished; confident; sounds ready for audition/performance

column2: Very Out of Tune - Frequently wrong notes or severely off-pitch; painful to hear
column3: Inconsistent Pitch - Often sharp or flat; struggles to center notes; noticeable pitch drift
column4: Moderate Accuracy - Generally in tune with occasional lapses; some notes not centered
column5: Good Pitch Control - Mostly accurate; minor deviations that don't distract
column6: Excellent Intonation - Precise pitch throughout; notes are centered and stable

column2: Harsh/Thin - Strained or pinched sound; no resonance; unpleasant timbre
column3: Underdeveloped - Weak or airy tone; lacks focus and projection; inconsistent quality
column4: Acceptable - Functional tone; some warmth but lacks richness; occasional harshness
column5: Good Sound - Full and focused; consistent quality; pleasant to listen to
column6: Beautiful Tone - Rich, warm, resonant; excellent projection and core; characteristic trumpet sound

column2: Erratic - No sense of pulse; rushes and drags constantly; rhythm is unrecognizable
column3: Unstable - Inconsistent tempo; frequent rushing or dragging; rhythmic errors
column4: Somewhat Steady - Maintains basic pulse but with some wobbles; occasional rhythmic mistakes
column5: Solid Rhythm - Consistent tempo; minor fluctuations; rhythms are mostly accurate
column6: Rock Solid - Impeccable timing; steady pulse; all rhythms perfectly executed

column2: Poor Control - Missed notes; cracked attacks; no dynamic range; sloppy articulation
column3: Weak Execution - Struggles with technical passages; limited range/dynamics; unclear tonguing
column4: Adequate - Can execute basic techniques; some slurs or attacks not clean; moderate control
column5: Good Command - Clean attacks; smooth slurs; appropriate dynamics; controlled playing
column6: Masterful - Effortless execution; crisp articulation; wide dynamic range; precise control
